# Foxtra Website - llms.txt

## About Foxtra
Foxtra is a technology partnership studio helping startups and SMEs align business goals with scalable software delivery. We provide fractional CTO leadership, cloud architecture, automation, and full-cycle product execution so teams can move faster with confidence.

## Company Stats
- Founded: 2025
- Happy Clients: 100+
- Team Members: 10+
- Success Rate: 99%

## Service Pillars

### Fractional CTO & Advisory
- Virtual CTO — On-demand technology leadership for growing teams
- Tech Strategy & Roadmap — Align initiatives to measurable business outcomes
- System Architecture Review — Identify bottlenecks, security gaps, and scalability issues
- Cloud & DevOps Advisory — Optimise cost, performance, and reliability across AWS/Azure/GCP
- Team Mentoring & Leadership — Coach internal engineering and product teams
- AI & Automation Strategy — Integrate AI agents, automation, and analytics responsibly
- Process Setup — Standardise delivery workflows and governance
- CRM Setup — Configure, migrate, and optimise leading CRM platforms
- Operations Support — Provide ongoing technology operations coverage

### Build & Run
- Custom Web Development
- Mobile App Development
- API Development
- Cloud Management
- Automations (n8n, workflow orchestration)

### Growth & Marketing
- Email Marketing
- SMS Marketing
- Video Marketing
- Social Media Management
- Social Media Ads
- Google Ads

## Industry Solutions
We tailor delivery models for:
- Accountants
- Car Mechanics
- Car Wash Services
- Childcare
- Electricians
- Lawyers
- Medical Practices
- Pest Control
- Plumbers
- Real Estate

## Website Structure

### Core Pages
- Home (/)
- About (/about)
- CTO Services Overview (/cto-services)
- Pricing (/pricing)
- Case Studies (/case-studies)
- Blog (/blog)
- Contact (/contact)
- Get Started (/get-started)
- Showcase (/showcase)

### CTO Service Detail Pages
- Virtual CTO (/cto-services/virtual-cto)
- Tech Strategy & Roadmap (/cto-services/tech-strategy)

- Operations Support (/cto-services/operations-support)

- Terms of Service (/terms)

### Resources & Support
- Case Study Library (/resources/case-studies)
- Bookings (/bookings)
- Support Contact (/support/contact)

## Key Capabilities
- Modern React + Next.js architecture with TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS for responsive design
- HubSpot CRM, analytics, and automation integrations
- Portfolio, testimonials, and carousel showcases
- Framer Motion micro-interactions and animations
- Secure contact, booking, and demo request flows

## Client Testimonials

- Jith (Dreamrise)
- Lokesh (Lotez)
- Sid (Realnest)
- Vunnam (VHT)

- Primary Contact: /contact
- Support: /support/contact
- Bookings: /bookings

Foxtra combines strategic technology leadership with delivery squads to help businesses plan, build, and scale digital products quickly and reliably.
